name: BOAT-IN SITES (LAKE SONOMA)
description: Overview Lake Sonoma's Boat-In Sites are scattered around beautiful Lake Sonoma, only a 45-minute drive north of Santa Rosa and a two-hour drive from San Francisco. BOAT-IN CAMPGROUNDS ARE ACCESSIBLE BY WATER OR HIKING ONLY, THERE IS NO VEHICLE ACCESS TO ANY BOAT-IN CAMPGROUND World famous vineyards and a land rich in history surround the lake, where visitors enjoy boating, fishing and exploring the area's extensive trail network. Recreation The lake provides great boating and swimming opportuni

whatTheyOffer: Campground at Lake Sonoma. Reservations available through Recreation.gov.
howToGetIt: Make a reservation through Recreation.gov. Book early as popular sites fill up quickly.
